full_summary:
### Refresh for W6399-21CA01 Supply of Dual-Purpose Canines Supply Arrangement - Master Agreement

#### Details
* Reference Number: WS3897572902-Doc3897667653
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: WS3897572902
* Publication Date: 2023-03-01
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-14T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-03-02

#### Description
The Government of Canada is issuing a Master Agreement for the supply of Canines that can perform a variety of tasks under the direct control of a handler. The Canines will primarily be used for training purposes and will be deployed in challenging operational environments.

Serious bidders are invited to participate in this request for supply arrangement. The bid is open for all interested and qualified suppliers. To be considered for this agreement, bidders must demonstrate their ability to provide a selection of dual-purpose canines that can meet the specified requirements. Bidders must also have experience in supplying canines for various training and operational environments.

#### Key Requirements
* The Canines must possess unique skills and be capable of performing a variety of tasks under the direct control of a handler.
* The Canines must be able to work in challenging operational environments.
* Bidders must have a proven track record of supplying canines for various training and operational environments.

#### Procurement Details
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Traditional Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest price
* Notice Type: None
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entities Name: Department of National Defence (DND)

#### Contact Information
For more information or to participate in this tender, contact Jeffrey Smallwood (SPAC/PSPC) at jeffrey.smallwood@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Notice URL
The notice for this tender can be accessed at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx). 

Note: In the rewritten version, some fields have been extracted and presented in a more readable format. Additionally, some phrases have been rephrased to improve clarity. The text has also been condensed to fit within the 400-word limit. Let me know if you need
